item.title: Norfolk Lambswool Vee Neck Slipover - Classic Fit
item.description: Perfect for both work and play, our soft and warm, versatile Norfolk slipover will provide lots of stylish wear and wonderful warmth for seasons to come. Excellently crafted from super soft, pure lambswool, this slipover is a cosy must-have when it comes to building understated, smart-casual outfits.&nbsp;All Alan Paine knitwear is fully fashioned; each garment is knitted to shape on the knitting machine and not cut and sewn. Each slipover has two main component parts: back and front. It is our skill in assembling these parts that is another mark of Alan Paine quality.Each stitch is linked by hand onto another to give the smoothest join possible. All Alan Paine garments are finished by hand. The stress points of the garment &ndash; under the arms and the ribs &ndash; are all reinforced.

item.title: Hampshire Lambswool Saddle Shoulder Vee Neck Jumper - Classic Fit
item.description: Our men&rsquo;s Hampshire traditional classic fitting vee neck jumper is a timeless addition to any man&rsquo;s wardrobe. Expertly crafted from super soft lambswool this sweater comes with traditional saddle shoulder and available in a range of wearable colours. To ensure maximum comfort, all our Classic Fit styles are generously cut across the waist, designed with a relaxed, more-traditional.Each sweater has three main component parts: back, front and sleeves. It is our skill in assembling these parts that is another mark of Alan Paine quality. Each stitch is linked by hand onto another to give the smoothest join possible. All Alan Paine garments are finished by hand. The stress points of the garment &ndash; under the arms, the cuffs and the ribs &ndash; are all reinforced &ndash; and the mitre of the &ldquo;V&rdquo; neck is closed by hand to give a perfect finish.&nbsp;

item.title: Dunswell Mens Waterproof Jacket - Shooting Fit
item.description: This highly technical waterproof jacket is crafted from a high quality robust cotton rich outer fabric. With a waterproof level of 10000mm and a breathability of 20000, the wearer will remain dry and comfortable whilst out in the most punishing conditions.The jacket has waterproof windbreaker cuffs plus a waterproof drip strip at the bottom of the lining. Furthermore, we are so confident of its durability that each jacket comes with a two-year guarantee.With pleated sleeves, an action back, copious pockets and a detachable and adjustable peak hood it is perfect for any shooter. Two cartridge pockets come complete with handy eyelet drainage holes; there are two essential hand-warmer pockets, a hunter&rsquo;s pouch, a secure map pocket under the coat&rsquo;s front placket and two internal secure pockets for your valuables.Extra zips are a clever addition enabling the wearer to zip in one of our Aylsham fleece waistcoats to provide additional layering if required.

Finished with a lace up front for added comfort, as well as Alan Paine branding to the front tongue for added style and wearability, these boots will carry through this season and beyond with ease.

item.title: Ladies Leather Tall Waterproof Country Boot
item.description: Coming Soon The Alan Paine Ladies Country Boots are perfect for enjoying country living, offering a stylish waterproof and breathable boot you are sure to love!These boots are the perfect companion come rain or shine this season and beyond. The waterproof &amp; breathable leather outer is ideal for offering you added comfort and wearability, drying out quickly after getting caught out in those unpredictable showers. The adjustable buckle fastening offers you a secure and sure fit, keeping you comfortable whilst on the move. Complete with excellent heel stability and flexible forefoot &amp; wool-lined foot for added comfort and warmth as the colder days draw in. Finished with a tweed detail around the top inner lining, as well as Alan Paine branding crest embossed on the outer back edge for added style and wearability, these boots will carry through this season and beyond with ease.

item.title: Combrook Mens Waterproof Tweed Shooting Coat - Shooting Fit
item.description: New Woodland Tweed ColourwayThe Combrook Mens Shooting Coat has been part of our product offering since the launch of the country collection and continues to be one of the most popular garments in the Combrook range.Engineered with a 100% wool water repellent outer, this robust and hardwearing garment is armed with a waterproof &amp; breathable membrane to keep you comfortable in the most testing of weather conditions. Insulated with a soft polyester wadding alongside deep manly hand warmer pockets and storm cuffs, all to keep you warm on those cold wintery mornings.

item.title: Combrook Mens Tweed Blazer - Classic Fit
item.description: New Woodland Tweed ColourwayIf the occasion calls for something smart then our Combrook Mens Tweed Blazer with its 100% water repellent outer certainly fits the bill.Superbly tailored with a 3 button front closure, double back vents, ticket pocket, two internal pockets along with its contrast lining tonal with the tweed over check to complete the look.This exquisite garment will certainly be a valued addition to any wardrobe.

item.title: Combrook Ladies Tweed Breeks
item.description: New for Autumn | Winter 2018 are these very flattering pair of ladies tweed breeks made from a soft rich blend of pure wool tweed for a naturally hard-wearing warm pair of country breeks.Available on their own or with matching waistcoat, jacket and hats if you are looking for a full tweed ladies shooting suit.

item.title: Combrook Ladies Tweed Lined-Back Waistcoat - Classic Fit
item.description: Complete your classic Alan Paine look this season and beyond with the Combrook Ladies Lined-Back Waistcoat, perfect for layering up in style to complete your country inspired look.This beautifully crafted waistcoat features a water repellent outer for those unpredictable showers, a feminine tailored shape & stunning contrast lining to match the over-check.

item.title: Felwell Ladies Quilted Jacket - Classic Fit
item.description: Lightweight and easy to wear everyday quilted jacket by Alan Paine. Water repellent outer with a pretty paisley lining featuring a two-way front zip with studded placket. Finished with mock suede trims throughout.
